attributes.action: Scrap Ken Livingstone £25.00 pounds per day congestion charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ken Livingstone want to charge People with the most polluting cars, such as sports utility vehicles and high-powered performance cars,25 pounds to drive into central London.This is totaly out of order.Ken Livingstone needs to bring a more fair charge
